data.prayer: Father, help 288 new simple churches start among the 1,443,400 people in the state of Pahang, Malaysia. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pahang, Malaysia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Pahang, Malaysia humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Pahang, Malaysia, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 1,443,400 people living in Pahang through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the South Asian, Bengali-speaking people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Pahang, Malaysia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 50,785 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Lord, help the people of Pahang, Malaysia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
